import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE="http://localhost:3000";function AuthModal(_ref){let{setToken}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleAuth=async type=>{try{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/auth/").concat(type),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok)throw new Error(data.error||"".concat(type," failed"));localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);setToken(data.token);}catch(err){alert(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"authModal",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:e=>e.preventDefault(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAuth("login"),children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAuth("register"),children:"Register"})]})});}export default AuthModal;
